promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word pokemon name for a chibi young simple lion steel-type with metallic fur. It can be found in mountain-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon or steel. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Lionitis, a chibi young simple lion steel-type pokemon. It can be found in mountain-like environments It has the following abilities: metal-sound, corkscrew-crash--special. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word lion or steel or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of steel-type pokemon, lion-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, grey shadows
generatedDescription: Lionitis skitters across mountain slopes, pausing to strike foes with its chiming roar and spinning crash.
